title: I'll create a
successful
website for you
heroSection.text: I am Adam Bartůšek and I specialize in developing websites and e-shops. I develop each project from scratch and code everything myself. Do not hesitate to contact me and together we will find the best solution for you.

title: I provide
comprehensive
tailored services
servicesSection.subtitle: MY SERVICES
servicesSection.text: I provide web development services, from modern websites and e-commerce sites to powerful web applications that meet your unique needs.

title: Take a look at
my
projects
portfolioSection.subtitle: PORTFOLIO
portfolioSection.text: Below are the projects I have created for inspiration.

title: Hello,
my name is Adam
Bartůšek
introductionSection.subtitle: ABOUT ME
text: I am a programmer specializing in modern web technologies. I offer comprehensive services in the development of websites, e-shops, and web applications. My work focuses on speed, functionality, and user-friendliness.

Each project is tailor-made, considering your needs and goals. My goal is not only to meet your expectations but to exceed them. Together, we will create a solution that sets you apart and propels your business forward.

box.text: I started my programming journey, which became the foundation of my professional career in web development.
I began working at ComArr as a web developer, developing a web application for thousands of users.
I successfully completed my bachelor's degree in Information Management at the University of Hradec Králové.

title: I develop
authentic
websites
specializationSection.subtitle: VISION
text: I specialize in Next.js, allowing me to create powerful, scalable, and modern web applications. I do not use pre-made templates or libraries – every project is designed and implemented from scratch to perfectly meet your needs.
This approach ensures your website is not only unique but also optimized for performance and tailored to the specifics of your business.

title: Ready to realize
your
project?
ctaSection.subtitle: COLLABORATION
ctaSection.text: If you are looking for a web developer who will create an authentic, modern, and high-performance custom website for you, you are in the right place. Together, we will create a solution that is not only functional but also stands out in the competition.

list.title: We'll find the right direction together
list.text: In our first meeting, we'll figure out exactly what you need. You don't need to have a clear idea in advance – together, we'll find the best solution.

list.title: I'll build your solution
list.text: I'll design and create a project that is fast, responsive, and perfectly reflects your brand.

list.title: We'll refine everything to perfection
list.text: We'll review the finished project together, I'll get your feedback, and make adjustments according to your preferences.

list.title: I'll take care of it post-launch
list.text: After the website is live, I'll handle updates, maintenance, and long-term support so you can focus on your business.

box.title: Performance
box.text: Your website will be lightning-fast and handle high traffic effortlessly.

box.title: Responsiveness
box.text: Modern design that adapts to every device.

box.title: SEO
box.text: We'll help you stand out in search engines and attract more customers.

box.title: Authenticity
box.text: Websites tailored to your needs and brand.

btn.aria: Navigate to the Aurea Socials website

field.label: Name:
field.hintText: The name must be 2 to 30 characters long and can contain only letters, spaces, and hyphens.

field.label: Surname:
field.hintText: The surname must be 2 to 35 characters long and can contain only letters, spaces, and hyphens.

field.label: Phone number:
field.hintText: The phone number must contain 7 to 15 digits.

field.label: E-mail:
field.hintText: Enter a valid email address in the format, e.g., user@email.com.

field.label: Can you specifically define your request?
Scope of the project:
field.placeholder: Specify the subpages you want the project divided into, or the structure of the project.

field.label: Project functionalities:
field.placeholder: Specify the features you want in the project (e.g., multilingual support, dark/light mode, payment gateway, database, or anything else you can think of).

field.label: A website you like:
field.placeholder: Provide a link to a website you like visually, if you know one.

field.label: Your budget:
field.placeholder: Enter your budget expectation for the project.

field.label: Ideal delivery date:
field.placeholder: Specify if the project is urgent.

field.label: Other specifications:
field.placeholder: Provide additional information or requirements for the project.

field.label: Describe your request / inquiry:
field.placeholder: Describe your needs as thoroughly as possible. Ideally, select 'Yes' above and try to fill out the specific form.

notFound.title: 404: Page Not Found
notFound.text: The page you requested could not be found. It might be unavailable or has been removed.

title: Custom
web applications
card.subtitle: DEVELOPMENT
card.text: If you need a specific web application or have an idea and need help realizing it as a web application, feel free to contact me. Below are examples of web application categories.

title: Simple
websites
card.subtitle: PRESENTATION
card.text: Simple websites are ideal for individuals or small companies that need an online presentation with minimal content. This option offers a single page focused on simplicity.
list: Custom domain including the option for business email
Extension options - day and night mode, multilingual, and content management system

title: Complex
websites
card.subtitle: PRESENTATION
card.text: Complex websites are suitable for companies that need more content and fast navigation between 1-5 pages. This type of website also includes a day and night mode for a more pleasant user experience.
list: Custom domain including the option for business email
Extension options - multilingual and content management system

title: Professional
websites
card.subtitle: PRESENTATION
card.text: Professional websites are ideal for companies that need an extensive and interactive website with more than 5 pages. This type of website includes a content management system, multilingual support, and day/night mode.
list: Custom domain including the option for business email

title: E-shop for
individuals
card.subtitle: SALES
card.text: The e-shop is ideal for individuals who want to start selling their products online but do not want to pay fees for a payment gateway. If you create your own products and want to offer them to customers at the lowest possible price, this type of e-shop is perfect for you.
list: Custom domain including the option for business email
Extension options - day and night mode, multilingual, product database, and user interface

title: E-shop for
retail
card.subtitle: SALES
card.text: The retail e-shop is designed for companies that need a robust online sales platform and have more products. This type of e-shop includes integration with a payment gateway, which is beneficial for handling more customers.
list: Custom domain including the option for business email
Extension options - product database and user interface

title: E-shop for
wholesale
card.subtitle: SALES
card.text: The wholesale e-shop is intended for companies that need a complex and extensive e-shop solution with their own user interface and access to their product database. This type of e-shop supports a large number of products.
list: Custom domain including the option for business email

info: The categorization is only indicative; we can always agree on a custom solution.
If you already have a website, we can discuss better management terms or modernize it together.
The price cannot be precisely determined here; it primarily depends on the complexity and size of the web application, and it is usually calculated based on the hours spent on the project.
